data.comment: The match has started at Estadio do Maracana.
Raphael Claus awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 3, Rodrigo Lindoso of Internacional smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Raphael Claus signals a Internacional throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Internacional have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 5, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Fluminense.
Free kick Fluminense.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Internacional.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Fluminense.
In the minute 17, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Raphael Claus signals a Fluminense throw-in in Internacional's half.
Internacional pushes forward through Patrick, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 20, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Paolo Guerrero for the away team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 23, Dodi is booked for the home team.
In the minute 24, Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Attention is being given to Internacional’s Edenilson and play has been suspended briefly.
Edenilson is back on the pitch.
Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 27, Thiago Galhardo (Internacional) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Internacional take a 0-1 lead thanks to Paolo Guerrero.
In the minute 28, Edenilson instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio do Maracana.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Fluminense.
Can Internacional capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Paolo Guerrero of Internacional gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 33, Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 35, Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Important block from the Internacional defence as Egidio fires in a strike for Fluminense.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fluminense surge into the attack at Estadio do Maracana but Luccas Claro’s header is off-target.
Raphael Claus awards Internacional a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Fluminense have been given a penalty...
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nene levels the score at 1-1 from the penalty spot.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Raphael Claus waits before resuming play because Ze Gabriel for Internacional is still down.
In the minute 43, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Ze Gabriel has recovered and rejoins the match in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 45, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a Internacional throw-in in Fluminense's half.
In the minute 45, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 46, Raphael Claus has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in Internacional.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
Nino (Fluminense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick Internacional.
In the minute 48, Fluminense will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Internacional.
Internacional's Gabriel Boschilia breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Internacional's Patrick gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Raphael Claus awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Fluminense.
In the minute 54, Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Raphael Claus awards the home team a throw-in.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 55, Internacional have a goal kick.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Gabriel Boschilia (Internacional) gets a yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In the minute 58, Can Internacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Fluminense's Egidio is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 60, In Rio de Janeiro Fluminense drive forward through Dodi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Fluminense.
Paolo Guerrero is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 66, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eduardo Coudet (Internacional) has taken off Paolo Guerrero who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. William Pottker is the replacement.
In the minute 67, Internacional to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Marcos Guilherme is replacing Gabriel Boschilia for the away team.
Free kick in a good position for Internacional!
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Fluminense drives forward and Egidio gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Fluminense.
In the minute 72, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 73, Luccas Claro for Fluminense drives towards goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Fluminense make their first substitution with Luiz Henrique replacing Marcos Paulo.
Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a second substitution, with Wellington Silva replacing Michel Araujo.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Fluminense.
Nene converts the penalty to give Fluminense a 2-1 lead.
Raphael Claus signals a Fluminense throw-in in Internacional's half.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Evanilson with Yago Felipe.
Raphael Claus signals a Fluminense throw-in in Internacional's half.
Damian Musto is replacing Rodrigo Lindoso for Internacional at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 80, Peglow is on a sub for Thiago Galhardo for Internacional.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Fluminense.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Fluminense.
Renzo Saravia (Internacional) has received a yellow card from Raphael Claus.
Odair Hellmann is making the team's third substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Ganso replacing Nene.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Yuri Alberto is on a sub for Patrick for Internacional.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Raphael Claus will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Internacional are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Free kick Fluminense.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
